overview: A young aristocrat, Aleksei Fedyashev, is languishing in his family's country estate, spending his days reading poetry and confessing his love... to a statue. Upon hearing that famous Count Cagliostro is touring Russia and has created quite a buzz in high society with his "magic", he decides to ask the Count to bring the statue to life...
cast: Nodar Mgaloblishvili|Aleksandr Abdulov|Semyon Farada|Leonid Bronevoy|Tatyana Pelttser
